channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: BAPI\\RFC Definition
item.description: BAPI\RFC Definition Use this page while configuring a BAPI template or an RFC template. To access this page: Click Categories in the Navigation pane. Click the Template icon for a BAPI or RFC template. Click Vertical View. Click the Configuration tab. Click the BAPI/RFC Definition icon.

item.title: BAPI\\RFC Definition: Field
item.description: BAPI\RFC Definition: Field Use this page to view the fields for a loop in a BAPI\RFC definition while configuring a BAPI or RFC template. To access this page: Click Categories in the Navigation pane. Click the Template icon for a BAPI or RFC template. Click Vertical View. Click the Configuration tab. Click the BAPI/RFC Definition icon. Click the BAPI Fields icon.

item.title: BDC Post Methods and Settings on the Advanced tab
item.description: BDC Post Methods and Settings on the Advanced tab If the process post is based on a process with a single BDC Script template, a user can select from any of the options in the BDC Post Method list box on the Advanced tab of the Process Post page’s Vertical View. A process post with multiple templates, or one that is based on a template type other than BDC Script, can only use the StandardSAPPosting BDC Post Method.

item.title: BDC Screen Conditionals
item.description: BDC Screen Conditionals Use this page to Configure a Conditional for a BDC Screen. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categoriesfrom Navigation pane. Click the Templatesicon for a category. Locate the template with a type ofBDC Script. ClickVertical View. Click Configurationtab. Click BDC Screenicon. Click Vertical Viewfor a screen. Click the Conditionalsicon.

item.title: BDC Screen Fields H
item.description: BDC Screen Fields H BDC Screen Fields V Use this page to Manage BDC Screens and Fields. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categoriesfrom Navigation pane. Click the Templatesicon for a category. Locate the template with a type ofBDC Script. ClickVertical View. Click Configurationtab. Click BDC Screenicon. Click the Fieldsicon for a screen. Field Description PRIORITY Displays the order the field was captured in the BDC recording.

item.title: BDC Screen H
item.description: BDC Screen H BDC Screen V All Tabs Use this page to Manage BDC Screens and Fields and Configure Template Loops for a BDC Script Template. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categoriesfrom Navigation pane. Click the Templatesicon for a category. Locate the template with a type ofBDC Script. ClickVertical View. Click Configurationtab. Click BDC Screenicon. Field Description PRIORITY Displays the order the SAP screen was accessed in the recording.

item.title: BDCdirect: Script
item.description: BDCdirect: Script Use this page to Import Legacy BDCdirect® Scripts into Integrate. To access this page, select Integrate > Advanced > BDCdirectfrom Navigation pane. Field Description Mark All As Import Click to enable the IMPORT check box for all BDCdirect® scripts, marking all scripts for import into Integrate. Clear All Import Click to disable the IMPORT check box for BDCdirect® scripts.

item.title: BDCPlus: Templates
item.description: BDCPlus: Templates Use this page to Import Legacy BDCPlus Templates into Integrate. To access this page, select Integrate > Advanced > BDCPlusfrom Navigationpane. Field Description BDC Plus Extract Click to populate the stBDCPlus* table using a backup of the BDCPlus database. Mark All As Import Click to enable the IMPORT check box for all BDCPlus templates, marking all templates for import into Integrate.

item.title: Categories
item.description: Categories Use this page to Create Categories. To access this page, select Integrate > Categoriesfrom Navigationpane. Field Description CATEGORY Displays the name of the category to which templates and processes are added. DESCRIPTION Displays a description of the category. Templates Click to open the Template page to add, edit, and delete templates for the category. The number displays the total of active and inactive templates.

item.title: Copy
item.description: Copy Use this page to Copy a Template Copy a Process Copy a Process Template Merge or Copy BDC Screens to Another BDC Script Template To access this page: Select Integrate > Categorieson Navigation pane. Click Templatesfor a category. Click Vertical Viewfor the template that should be copied. ClickCopy tab. Click Copy Template.

item.title: Custom Fields
item.description: Custom Fields Use this page to Add Custom Fields to a BDC Script Template. To access this page: Click Integrate > Categoriesin the Navigationpane. Click Templatesfor a category. Click Vertical Viewfor a template with a TYPE of BDC Script. Click Configurationtab. Click Custom Fields.

item.title: File Structure Field Element - Attributes
item.description: File Structure Field Element - Attributes Use this page to Configure an XML Template with Structures, Elements and Attributes. NOTE:This page is only available for processes based on User Defined XML template type. To access this page: Click Integrate > Categoriesin the Navigationpane. Click the Templatesicon. Click Vertical Viewfor a User Defined Template Type of XML. Click the Defineicon. Click the Fieldsicon. Click the Attributesicon for an element with the ELEMENT TYPE of Element.

item.title: GUI Script Actions
item.description: GUI Script Actions Use this page when Modifying a GUI Script with a Custom Command. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categories from Navigation pane. Click the Templates icon for a category. Locate the Template with a Type of GUI Script. Click Vertical View. Click Configuration tab. Click GUI Script Data button. Click Vertical View for a field. Click Recording tab. Click Commands to view the commands and actions captured for this field during the GUI script recording.

item.title: GUI Script Commands
item.description: GUI Script Commands Use this page when Modifying a GUI Script with a Custom Command. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categories from Navigation pane. Click the Templates icon for a category. Locate the Template with a Type of GUI Script. Click Vertical View. Click Configuration tab. Click GUI Script Data button. Click Vertical View for a field. Click Recording tab. Click Commands to view the commands and actions captured for this field during the GUI script recording.

item.title: GUI Script Conditionals
item.description: GUI Script Conditionals Use this page to Configure Conditional GUI Script Data Records. To access this page: Select Integrate >Categories on Navigation pane. Click the Templates icon for a category. Click Vertical View for a template based on a GUI script. Click Configuration tab. Click the GUI Script Data icon. Click Vertical Viewfor a data record. Click Conditionals icon.

item.title: GUI Script Data H
item.description: GUI Script Data H GUI Script Data V All Tabs Use this page to: Delete GUI Script Fields Copy a GUI Script Data Record. Configure Template Loops for a GUI Script Template To access this page: Select Integrate >Categories on Navigation pane. Click the Templates icon for a category. Click Vertical View for a template based on a GUI script. Click Configuration tab. Click GUI Script Data. Field Description PRIORITY Displays the order the field was captured in the GUI recording.

item.title: Message File
item.description: Message File Use this page to view messages while Using a Process Post Record to Post to SAP for a Process Based on a GUI Script Template or Using a Process Post Record to Post to SAP for a Process Based on a BDC Script Template To access this page: Click Integrate > Categories on Navigation pane. Click the Processes icon for a category. Click the Postings icon for a process.

item.title: Messages H
item.description: Messages H Messages V Use this page while: Posting Data for a Process Based on a BDC Script Template Posting Data for a Process Based on a GUI Script Template Posting Data for a Process Based on a BAPI Posting Data for a Process Based on an RFC To access this page: Click Integrate > Categories on Navigation pane. Click the Processes icon for a category. Click the Postings icon for a process.

item.title: Post Adapter
item.description: Post Adapter Use this page to Monitor Posts. To access this page: Select Integrate > Advanced > Post Engine from Navigation pane. Click Post Adapter to view the data as it was submitted for the process post, and to submit the post again using one of the posting methods. Field Description POSTING ID Displays the unique ID for the process post generated by Integrate.

item.title: Post Engine H
item.description: Post Engine H Post Engine V Use this page to Monitor Posts. To access this page, select Integrate > Advanced > Post Engine from Navigation pane. Field Description Execute Post Engine Poller Click to execute the poller, which searches for posts using the posting method Background Post and executes the posting. POST ENGINE ID Displays the unique post engine ID generated by Integrate.

item.title: Post File Logs
item.description: Post File Logs Use this page to Monitor Posts. To access this page: Select Integrate > Post Monitor from Navigation pane to view details about every process post. Or Access the Post Monitor page for a specific process post by selecting Monitor on the Process Post page Horizontal View. Click Vertical View for a process Click Templates. Click Files. Click Remote System Log. Field Description POST FILE LOG ID Displays the ID generated by Integrate for each step in the process post.

item.title: Post Files
item.description: Post Files Use this page to Monitor Posts. To access this page: Select Integrate > Post Monitor from Navigation pane to view details about every process post. Or Access the Post Monitor page for a specific process post by selecting Monitor on the Process Post page Horizontal View. Click Vertical View for a process Click Templates. Click Files. Field Description FILE NAME Displays the path and location of the file containing the post file.

item.title: Post Monitor H
item.description: Post Monitor H Post Monitor V Use this page to Monitor Posts. To access this page: Select Integrate > Post Monitor from Navigation pane to view details about every process post. OR Access the Post Monitor page for a specific process post by selecting Monitor on the Process Post page Horizontal View. Field Description POSTING ID Displays the ID for the process post generated by Integrate.

item.title: Post Monitor Template
item.description: Post Monitor Template Use this page to Monitor Posts. To access this page: Select Post Monitor from Navigation pane to view details about every process post. Or Access the Post Monitor page for a specific process post by selecting Monitor on the Process Postpage Horizontal View. Click Vertical View for a process post to view additional details about the post, including a message returned from the target system regarding post status, the status of the current template, and audit information.

item.title: Process H
item.description: Process H Process V All Tabs Use this page to Create a Process and Activate a Process. NOTE: Refer to the section on each template type for information about activating a process. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categories from Navigation pane. Click the Processes icon for a category. Process V All Tabs Process H Use this page to Create a Process and Activate a Process. This page has the following tabs:

item.title: Process Post Connections
item.description: Process Post Connections Use this page to Set Connections to Target Systems at the Process Post Level. To access this page: Click Integrate > Categories on Navigation pane. Click the Processes icon for a category. Click the Postings icon for a process. Click the Connectionsicon.

item.title: Process Post H
item.description: Process Post H Process Post V All Tabs Use this page to: Use a Process Post Record to Post to SAP for a Process Based on a BDC Script Template Use a Process Post Record to Post to SAP for a Process Based on a GUI Script Template Use a Process Post Record to Post to SAP for a Process Based on a BAPI Use a Process Post Record to Post to SAP for a Process Based on an RFC Create and Transfer Delimited or Fixed Width Files Create and Transfer XML Files To access this page:

item.title: Process Template After Post Rule Collect Where
item.description: Process Template After Post Rule Collect Where Use this page when Registering a Collect Download After Post Rule that is Built Automatically. To access this page: Select Integrate >Categoriesin the Navigationpane. Click the Processesicon for a category. Click the Templatesicon for a process. Click the After Post Rulesicon for template ID. Click the Collect Where Clauseicon.

item.title: Process Template Connections
item.description: Process Template Connections Use this page to Set Available Connections at the Process Template Level. To access this page: Select Integrate >Categories from Navigation pane. Click the Processes icon for a category. Click the Templates icon for a process. Click the Allowed Connectionsicon.

item.title: Process Template Loop
item.description: Process Template Loop Use this page to: Configure a Process Template Loop for a BDC Script Template with a Single Loop Configure Process Template Loops for a BDC Script Template with Looping Enabled Configure a Process Template Loop for a GUI Script Template with a Single Loop Configure Process Template Loops for a GUI Script Template with Looping Enabled Configure Process Template Loops for a BAPI Template Configure Process Template Loops for an RFC Template Configure Process Template Loops for an XML Template Configure Process Template Loops for a Delimited or User Defined Template NOTE: This page displays fields based on the template type associated with the Process template.

item.title: Process Template Loop Field Mappings H
item.description: Process Template Loop Field Mappings H Process Template Loop Field Mappings V Use this page to: Configure Field Mappings for a Process Based on a BDC Script Template Configure Field Mappings for a Process Based on a GUI Script Template Configure Field Mappings for a Process Based on an RFC Configure Field Mappings for a Process Based on a BAPI To access this page: Select Integrate > Categories from Navigation pane.

item.title: Process Templates H
item.description: Process Templates H Process Templates V Use this page to Add Templates to a Process. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categories from Navigation pane. Click the Processes icon for a category. Click the Templates icon for a process. Process Templates V Process Templates H Use this page to: Configure Process Template Loops for an XML Template Configure Process Template Loops for a Delimited or User Defined Template This page has the following tabs:

item.title: Relationship Mapping
item.description: Relationship Mapping Use this page to configure relationships for BDC Script, GUI Script,BAPI, RFC and XML template types. To access this page: Click Integrate > Categories from Navigation pane. Click the Processes icon for a category. Click the Loops icon for a process based on an XML template. Click Relationships on Page toolbar. Field Description Upload Displays the parent relationship for the process template, and the relationship that is linked to the children process templates.

item.title: Relationship Mapping BDC Script, GUI Script or BAPI/RFC Template Types
item.description: Relationship Mapping BDC Script, GUI Script or BAPI/RFC Template Types Use this page to: View and Configure Relationships for a Process Based on a BDC Script Template View and Configure Relationships for a Process Based on a GUI Script Template View and Configure Relationships for a Process Based on a BAPI View and Configure Relationships for a Process Based on an RFC NOTE:This page is only available for processes based on BDC Script, GUI Script and BAPI/RFC template types.

item.title: Structure
item.description: Structure NOTE: The fields that display on this page are based on the selected type. This page is available for User Defined Fixed Width and Delimited Template Types and for XML template types. Structure H User Defined Fixed Width and Delimited Template Types Structure V User Defined Template Type Use this page to Create a Delimited or Fixed Width User Defined Template. To access this page: Click Integrate > Categoriesin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Structure Field
item.description: Structure Field NOTE: The fields that display on this page are based on the selected type. This page is available for User Defined Fixed Width and Delimited Template Types and for XML Template Types. Structure Field User Defined Fixed Width and Delimited Template Types Use this page while Creating a Delimited or Fixed Width User Defined Template. To access this page: Click Integrate > Categoriesin the Navigationpane. Click the Templatesicon.

item.title: Template H
item.description: Template H Template V All Tabs Use this page to Create a Basic Template. To access this page: Select Integrate > Categories from the Navigation pane. Click the Templates icon for a category. Template V All Tabs Template H This page has the following tabs: General tab BDC Script Template Type Configuration tab BDC Script Template Type Documentation tab Copy tab General tab BAPI/RFC Template Type Configuration tab BAPI/RFC Template Type General tab GUI Script Template Type Configuration tab GUI Script Template Type General tab IG Universal Connect General tab: SAP Data Services Job Template Type General tab User Defined Template Types Configuration tab User Defined Template Type General tab BDC Script Template Type Use this page to Record a BDC Script and Import a BDC Script from a File.

item.title: Template Processes
item.description: Template Processes Use this page to Activate or Deactivate Multiple Processes for a Template. To access this page: Click Integrate > Categories on Navigation pane. Click the Templates icon for a category. Click the Processes icon for a template.

item.title: Template Report
item.description: Template Report To access this page, select Integrate > Categories > Template > Report. This report displays the data for the template selected on the Template page.

item.title: Template RFC Documentation
item.description: Template RFC Documentation Use this page while configuring a BAPI or RFC template to view the documentation about the BAPI\RFC that has been extracted from SAP for the selected record. To access this page: Click Categories in the Navigation pane. Click the Template icon for a BAPI or RFC template. Click Vertical View. Click the Configuration tab. Click the BAPI/RFC Definition icon. Click the RFC Documentation icon.
